timeline.bodyText: I suggest to move most classes in this package to io.grpc.rls.internal.*, as #6711, it could be very difficult to do it later due to pending merge conflicts.

replies.bodyText: good point. thanks removed to internal.

timeline.message: rls: build rls, exclude from publish

timeline.bodyText: nit: add /* server = */ to let linter check the arguments are passed in the right order

replies.bodyText: i believe this is no longer enforced.
replies.author: creamsoup

timeline.bodyText: These checks can move to the constructor. If you're not converting from json, e.g. convert from a proto or call the constructor directly in test, you don't have to write the checks again.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0
dapengzhang0

timeline.bodyText: nit: Use /*  argName = */ to let linter check if the args are correctly ordered.
